metadata.feature_description: Visual indicators showing engagement trends with up/down arrows and warnings

steps.expected: Successfully logged in and PersonaBar visible
steps.actual: Successfully logged in as SuperUser Account with PersonaBar visible

steps.expected: Community Analytics dashboard opens showing module performance with trend arrows
steps.actual: Community Analytics dashboard failed to load. JavaScript error: TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function at dashboardClass.init in social-dashboard-combined-instance.js:1025

issues: Critical JavaScript error prevents Community Analytics dashboard from loading: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function

steps.action: Attempt to access Community Analytics to view warning indicators
steps.expected: Dashboard loads showing status indicators (engagement-star, engagement-warning, engagement-error) based on health status
steps.actual: Cannot access feature - Community Analytics dashboard fails to initialize due to JavaScript error

issues: Feature untestable - Community Analytics module initialization fails with TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function

steps.action: Attempt to access Community Analytics to verify indicator colors
steps.expected: Dashboard loads showing percent-progress elements with higher (green/up arrow) and lower (red/down arrow) CSS classes
steps.actual: Cannot access feature - Community Analytics dashboard fails to initialize due to JavaScript error

issues: Feature untestable - Community Analytics module initialization fails with TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function

steps.action: Attempt to access Community Analytics to test tooltip displays
steps.expected: Dashboard loads and hovering over trend indicators shows tooltips via tag-menu elements with qaTooltip() functionality
steps.actual: Cannot access feature - Community Analytics dashboard fails to initialize due to JavaScript error

issues: Feature untestable - Community Analytics module initialization fails with TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function

observations: Code review confirms Engagement Trend Indicators are implemented using CSS classes: percent-progress with higher/lower classes for up/down arrows via icon-engagement-up.png and icon-engagement-down.png
Status indicators use statusClass binding with engagement-star (healthStatus=1), engagement-warning (healthStatus=2), and engagement-error (other) classes
Tooltips are implemented via .tag-menu elements with qaTooltip() jQuery plugin

Critical bug discovered: utility.serializeCustomDate function is called in social-dashboard-combined-instance.js:1025 but does not exist, causing the entire Community Analytics dashboard to fail initialization
This bug completely blocks testing of Engagement Trend Indicators feature as the dashboard cannot be accessed
